lore: How is your world/universe different from Earth I live in (if at all)?
What is the most important thing to know about where you live?
What are the important people in positions of power in your world/universe?
What is your most significant childhood memory?
What is your most significant travel memory?
What event most made you the person you are today?
What is your most significant achievement?
What is your most significant failure?
behaviors: What are some ways you typically spend your day?
How do you handle stress or pressure?
How do you show that someone is your friend?
How do you show that you dislike someone?
values: What are some things you think are great?
What are some things you think are terrible?
What do you value most in friendships or relationships?
style: What is your speaking style? Please be specific (e.g., Do you use a lot of slang?)?
Do you have any unqiue sayings or catchphrases?
